step1.title: Welcome to Kurd Med!
step1.content: This quick tour will show you how to use the app's main features. You can skip at any time.

step2.title: Scan Packaging
step2.content: Use the 'Packaging' option to identify medication by uploading a photo. The AI will analyze it for you.

step3.title: Search by Name
step3.content: If you know the medication's name, select 'Name Search' and type it in to get detailed information instantly.

step4.title: AI Medical Assistant
step4.content: Have a question? The 'AI Chatbot' is here to provide information about medications and health topics.

step5.title: You're All Set!
step5.content: You're ready to start. Remember to always consult a healthcare professional for medical advice.
